text: Oru Malarin Payanam (Tamil: ஒரு மலரின் பயணம்) is a 1985 Indian Tamil film, directed by Muktha Srinivasan and produced by Muktha V. Ramasasmy. The film stars Lakshmi, Murali, Urvashi and Sulakshana in lead roles. The film had musical score by Chandrabose. ==Cast== *Lakshmi *Murali *Urvashi *Sulakshana *Moulee *Manorama *Arundathi *A. Sakuntala *Vijaya Chandrika *Janagaraj *Idichapuli Selvaraj *Usilaimani *Veeraraghavan *Kathadi Ramamurthy *Oru Viral Krishna Rao *Ramji *G.K *Nagaraja Cholan *Vairam Krishnamoorthy *A. Soorya Kala *R. Jaya Chandira *M. R. Sulochana *Devi Chandira ==Soundtrack == Soundtrack was composed by Chandrabose.https://bollywoodvinyl.in/collections/kannada-malayalam-telugu- tamil-lps/products/oru-malarin-payanam-and-thandanai-tamil-bollywood-vinyl- lp-5 *Thedum En - TL Thiagarajan, Vani Jairam *Pillai Manam - Raj Sitharaman, Vani Jairam *Thandana - Vani Jairam *Neeya Ennai - Vani Jairam The songs were composed by Pulamaipithan, Vairamuthu, Na. Kamarasan and Mu.Mehta ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1985 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Tamil-language films Category:Films based on Indian novels Category:Films directed by Muktha Srinivasan
title: Oru Malarin Payanam
